job.title: ServiceNow Developer
job.description: We are currently accepting resumes for a ServiceNow/ATF Developer in Columbus, OH.  Required Skills and Experience:  - Bachelor’s degree in computer science, management information science, or related field 6-8 years’ experience   ServiceNow Developer skillset: Flow designer, Service Portal,CSM ATF Developer - all the above plus ATF  Must have a strong CSM and Service Portal skillset ServiceNow Contractor with Specialty experience with Customer Service Mgmt (CSM Module). Experience and knowledge of CSM and how it interacts with platform modules Angular, Javascript CSM CSM Portal (external and internal) Agent Workspace Major Case Natural Language Customer Mobile Service Catalog/Service Request  UNICON International, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.  If you are interested in working for an organization where honesty, integrity and quality are among the core principles then click apply today!  Keywords: ServiceNow, ATF, CSM, Angular, Javascript, Agent Workspace, Major Case, Natural Language, Customer Mobile, Service Catalog/Service Request
